Author: meowpurrpur
Name: Icons In World
Punchline: A simple plugin that displays icons directly in the game world instead of on the map. Made for fun, it's my first time making any mods for any game. I created it because I’m not great at reading maps and find it easier to navigate when icons appear where they actually are.
